.. _`design_system_components_numericedit`:

NumericEdit
===========

.. figure:: images/component_numeric-edit.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

NumericEdit component that can be used to limit the input to a numeric value. It can define a possible value range, the number of decimal places which can be entered as well as round the value up or down if specified.
